summary: A mansion for a mage, who prefers some elegance and style.
descriptionHtml:
A mansion for a mage, who prefers some elegance and style. 
Because of magical nature of this home inner space is larger then outer. ))

REQUIREMENTS:
 - Skyrim patch 1.4

HOW TO INSTALL:
- Just copy .esp to the Data folder and check it in Skyrim Launcher, etc.

LOCATION:
- Not far from Halfmoon Mill, landmark included but appears only on discovery

CHANGELOG:

Version 1.3
- Companions allowed to enter home
- All display cases are activators now
- Fixed terrain around the house
- Fixed some small bugs inside

Version 1.2
- Added basement with display cases and weapon racks
- Added some plants near the house
- Fixed terrain around the house

Version 1.1
- Added stone bricks around water pool
- Corrected some minor bugs
author: Anna-Lisa
